name: Investrs
slogan: Kickstarters CrowdTrading Platform for Startups & Investors in a $65 Billion Marketplace
description:
Investrs (crowdinvestment) platform has been built to bring the global community of Startups (entrepreneurs) and Investors closer together, by encouraging cross-pollination across the marketplace, the platform infinitely improves the chances of matching the right investor/s to each startup, in turn reducing lead time and significantly increasing the probability of securing investment. 

For Investors, the equity crowdinvestment marketplace offers an alternative solution to the standard (dated) stocks and bonds model, by providing a vast range of disruptive tech companies for Individuals, VC's and Family offices to select from. Investrs has developed a global trading platform, allowing each party to hedge their investments and spread their risk across multiple industries and technologies, from as little as £100 or as much as £100,000+, our marketplace allows you to build a diverse portfolio of exciting and innovative companies to help maximise your ROI.

team.title: Founder, CEO
team.name: Adrian Twibill
team.bioHtml: Founder & CEO across Fintech, Proptech & Traveltech: @WREX = Salesforce + Zillow tech combined, @Emtjets - Uber for Private Jet Travel & @Investrs

jobs.title: Outstanding CTO/Co Founder sought for Startups & Investors Cowdtrading platform (Fintech/AI)
jobs.description:
We are currently expanding and exploring the potential for a CTO to assist in building the technology, this opportunity will offer the chance to work with an exciting and rapidly expanding start-up with global sights. 

This role is ideal for ambitious, intelligent and entrepreneurial individuals looking to build a lucrative and exciting career with a revolutionary company within the Fintech space.

What we are looking for:

- Co-Founder, a forward thinker pushing the boundaries of a very exciting company within a $40 Billion annual marketplace
- Knowledge of blockchain technologies is a must
- AI technologies 
- Involvement in all future planning and expansion aspects of the company
- Building affiliate partnerships and relationships to help increase rapid growth
- Help raising capital to gain further traction and expansion 
- Planning, development and testing of the platform
- Development of the WREX infrastructure 
- Big Data 
- Website scraping of data
- Ideally knowledge of script writing but not mandatory 
- Preferably from a financial technical background, but not mandatory

What you get back:

- An equity stake in the company. (Depending on experience and involvement with the company we would increase or decrease this accordingly)
- Pushing the technical AI and blockchain boundaries, seeing the company grow globally becoming a mainstream name within the industry
- Rapid growth with the company through its global expansion
- Mirroring the tech model and expanding into multiple markets
- Exiting within 5 years via IPO or trade sale
- Be apart of a disruptive fintech model which is looking to redefine the industry as we know it...
